creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky

medium: Acrylic, graphite, and gesso on handmade paper
provenance: Estate of the artist; [Knoedler & Co., New York]; Private collection; [Sotheby's, New York, sale 3/07/13, lot 442]; Private collection; [Hill Gallery, Birmingham, Mich., sold to Mersky 3/02/16]; Robert B. Mersky, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Existing historical records indicate that the drawing is signed, dated, and titled, verso (drawing is framed; verso not visible)
title: Circle of Multifarious Precisions
